name: A 15 Year Voyage From Mars
description:
You’re approaching the end of a 15 year voyage transporting your colony to their new planet. There’s only one problem though - your landing mechanism won’t function if your ship is too heavy! Jettison rooms to make your ship lighter, but choose wisely - some might lead to the destruction of your ship!

How To Play: Press the scan button to find rooms available for jettisoning. Select a room and press ‘jettison’. Try to get your ship down to the respective target in the allocated time.
